Name: Spaghetti Bolognese
Ingredients: spaghetti, ground beef ,tomato, sauce, garlic onion
Instructions: Boil spaghetti. Cook beef with garlic and onion, add sauce and simmer.

Name: Pancakes
Instructions: Mix all ingredients into a batter. Fry on a pan until golden brown.

Name: Caesar Salad
Ingredients: romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, caesar dressing
Instructions: Toss lettuce with croutons, cheese, and dressing.

Name: Chicken Curry
Ingredients: chicken breast, curry powder, coconut milk, onion, garlic, ginger
Instructions: Cook chicken with onion, garlic, and ginger. Add curry powder and coconut milk, simmer for 20 minutes.

Name: Tacos
Ingredients: taco shells, ground beef, cheese, lettuce, tomato, salsa
Instructions: Cook beef, then fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, and salsa.

Name: Vegetable Stir Fry
Ingredients: bell pepper, broccoli, carrots, soy sauce, sesame oil
Instructions: Stir fry vegetables in sesame oil, add soy sauce, and cook until tender.

Name: Lasagna
Ingredients: lasagna noodles, ground beef, tomato sauce, ricotta cheese, mozzarella
Instructions: Layer cooked noodles with beef, sauce, and cheese. Bake at 350°F for 40 minutes.

Name: Fried Rice
Ingredients: rice, peas, carrots, eggs, soy sauce, sesame oil
Instructions: Cook rice and veggies in sesame oil, scramble eggs, mix with rice and soy sauce.

Name: Mushroom Soup
Ingredients: mushrooms, onion, garlic, vegetable broth, cream
Instructions: Sauté mushrooms with onion and garlic, add broth and cream, simmer for 20 minutes.

Name: Apple Pie
Instructions: Peel and slice apples. Mix with sugar and cinnamon, fill pie crust, and bake at 375°F for 45 minutes.

Name: Biriyani
Instructions: Heat up the water and boil rice,marinate chicken and put in dum
